name: Forklift Master 3D Realistic Simulator
description:
Beep beep . .back up the Forklift y’all. Pick up some stuff, drive it around. Or, just go nuts! The warehouse is your new home. Have a look around and see if you can find any zombies!!

There are 8 Levels to this game. As you beat one of the levels, the next level appears.

A forklift truck (also called a lift truck, a fork truck, or a forklift) is a powered industrial truck used to lift and transport materials. This game allows the player to get behind the wheel of the forklift and drive around a warehouse. Find the boxes, put them on the front of your forklift, and drive them to the correct location. Sound easy? Not so fast . . . difficulty level super hard. Super easy to control and drive around. Very short learning curve. Great game play. Very realistic 3D experience.

What others are saying:

"Wow. .. super fun. . .I get to drive around a forklift? Super cool" --Kim from NY

"Goo-ga boo boo ga" Robert, age 2, California

"Forklifts are the new Ferrari, so much fun!" --Some dude in Florida
